content: How can I change the default font in iPython Notebook? I'm new to Python and don't have any HTML experience. I am specifically looking for which CSS file to modify and what should be put in it to change the font. I am on a Windows system. I have tried solutions from previous Stack Overflow questions, including modifying an unnamed file in /usr/lib/python2.6/.../css/, changing the monospace font in the browser, and altering custom.css in the profile subdirectory /static/custom/custom.css. However, the font changed to italic after I change the monospace font in my browser, which is not what I intended.
